title: Unveiling Microplastics Pollution in Alaskan Water and Snow
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00092G, Paper
Subhabrata Dev, Davis Schwarz, Muradur Rashedin, Md Ibnul Hasan, Darya Kholodova, Shane Billings, David L Barnes, Nicole Misarti, Navid B Saleh, Srijan Aggarwal
While microplastics (MPs) are globally prevalent in marine environments, extending to the Arctic and sub-arctic regions, the extent and distribution of MPs in terrestrial waters, drinking water sources, and recreational...
